content:
TITLE: Specifying Python Package Dependencies with Conditional Version Constraints - requirements.txt - Python DESCRIPTION: This snippet enumerates required Python packages and their versions using requirements.txt format, applying conditional logic based on the target Python version and system platform. Comments provide further context about minimum, pinned, and rationale for specific versions, as well as compatibility with supported OS distributions. The expected input for this file is its use with Python tooling such as pip, and its output is the installation of the specified versions of the listed packages. Limitations include reliance on the specified distributions' package repositories and possible incompatibility if used outside of supported OS or Python versions. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/requirements.txt#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: Python CODE: ``` # The officially supported versions of the following packages are their\n# python3-* equivalent distributed in Ubuntu 24.04 and Debian 12\nasn1crypto==1.4.0 ; python_version < '3.11'\nasn1crypto==1.5.1 ; python_version >= '3.11'\nBabel==2.9.1 ; python_version < '3.11' # min version = 2.6.0 (Focal with security backports)\nBabel==2.10.3 ; python_version >= '3.11'\ncbor2==5.4.2 ; python_version < '3.12'\ncbor2==5.6.2 ; python_version >= '3.12'\nchardet==4.0.0 ; python_version < '3.11' # (Jammy)\nchardet==5.2.0 ; python_version >= '3.11'\ncryptography==3.4.8; python_version < '3.12' # incompatibility between pyopenssl 19.0.0 and cryptography>=37.0.0\ncryptography==42.0.8 ; python_version >= '3.12' # (Noble) min 41.0.7, pinning 42.0.8 for security fixes\ndecorator==4.4.2 ; python_version < '3.11' # (Jammy)\ndecorator==5.1.1 ; python_version >= '3.11'\ndocutils==0.17 ; python_version < '3.11' # (Jammy)\ndocutils==0.20.1 ; python_version >= '3.11'\nfreezegun==1.1.0 ; python_version < '3.11' # (Jammy)\nfreezegun==1.2.1 ; python_version >= '3.11'\ngeoip2==2.9.0\ngevent==21.8.0 ; sys_platform != 'win32' and python_version == '3.10' # (Jammy)\ngevent==22.10.2; sys_platform != 'win32' and python_version > '3.10' and python_version < '3.12'\ngevent==24.2.1 ; sys_platform != 'win32' and python_version >= '3.12' # (Noble)\ngreenlet==1.1.2 ; sys_platform != 'win32' and python_version == '3.10' # (Jammy)\ngreenlet==2.0.2 ; sys_platform != 'win32' and python_version > '3.10' and python_version < '3.12'\ngreenlet==3.0.3 ; sys_platform != 'win32' and python_version >= '3.12' # (Noble)\nidna==2.10 ; python_version < '3.12' # requests 2.25.1 depends on idna<3 and >=2.5\nidna==3.6 ; python_version >= '3.12'\nJinja2==3.0.3 ; python_version <= '3.10'\nJinja2==3.1.2 ; python_version > '3.10'\nlibsass==0.20.1 ; python_version < '3.11'\nlibsass==0.22.0 ; python_version >= '3.11' # (Noble) Mostly to have a wheel package\nlxml==4.8.0 ; python_version <= '3.10'\nlxml==4.9.3 ; python_version > '3.10' and python_version < '3.12' # min 4.9.2, pinning 4.9.3 because of missing wheels for darwin in 4.9.3\nlxml==5.2.1; python_version >= '3.12' # (Noble - removed html clean)\nlxml-html-clean; python_version >= '3.12' # (Noble - removed from lxml, unpinned for futur security patches)\nMarkupSafe==2.0.1 ; python_version <= '3.10'\nMarkupSafe==2.1.2 ; python_version > '3.10' and python_version < '3.12'\nMarkupSafe==2.1.5 ; python_version >= '3.12' # (Noble) Mostly to have a wheel package\nnum2words==0.5.10 ; python_version < '3.12' # (Jammy / Bookworm)\nnum2words==0.5.13 ; python_version >= '3.12' \nofxparse==0.21\nopenpyxl==3.0.9 ; python_version < '3.12'\nopenpyxl==3.1.2 ; python_version >= '3.12'\npasslib==1.7.4 # min version = 1.7.2 (Focal with security backports)\nPillow==9.0.1 ; python_version <= '3.10'\nPillow==9.4.0 ; python_version > '3.10' and python_version < '3.12'\nPillow==10.2.0 ; python_version >= '3.12' # (Noble) Mostly to have a wheel package\npolib==1.1.1\npsutil==5.9.0 ; python_version <= '3.10' \npsutil==5.9.4 ; python_version > '3.10' and python_version < '3.12' \npsutil==5.9.8 ; python_version >= '3.12' # (Noble) Mostly to have a wheel package\npsycopg2==2.9.2 ; python_version == '3.10' # (Jammy)\npsycopg2==2.9.5 ; python_version == '3.11'\npsycopg2==2.9.9 ; python_version >= '3.12' # (Noble) Mostly to have a wheel package\npyopenssl==21.0.0 ; python_version < '3.12'\npyopenssl==24.1.0 ; python_version >= '3.12' # (Noble) min 23.2.0, pinned for compatibility with cryptography==42.0.8 and security patches\nPyPDF2==1.26.0 ; python_version <= '3.10'\nPyPDF2==2.12.1 ; python_version > '3.10'\npypiwin32 ; sys_platform == 'win32'\npyserial==3.5\npython-dateutil==2.8.1 ; python_version < '3.11'\npython-dateutil==2.8.2 ; python_version >= '3.11'\npython-ldap==3.4.0 ; sys_platform != 'win32' and python_version < '3.12' # min version = 3.2.0 (Focal with security backports)\npython-ldap==3.4.4 ; sys_platform != 'win32' and python_version >= '3.12' # (Noble) Mostly to have a wheel package\npython-stdnum==1.17 ; python_version < '3.11' # (jammy)\npython-stdnum==1.19 ; python_version >= '3.11'\npytz # no version pinning to avoid OS perturbations\npyusb==1.2.1\nqrcode==7.3.1 ; python_version < '3.11' # (jammy)\nqrcode==7.4.2 ; python_version >= '3.11'\nreportlab==3.6.8 ; python_version <= '3.10'\nreportlab==3.6.12 ; python_version > '3.10' and python_version < '3.12'\nreportlab==4.1.0 ; python_version >= '3.12' # (Noble) Mostly to have a wheel package\nrequests==2.25.1 ; python_version < '3.11' # versions < 2.25 aren't compatible w/ urllib3 1.26. Bullseye = 2.25.1. min version = 2.22.0 (Focal)\nrequests==2.31.0 ; python_version >= '3.11' # (Noble)\nrjsmin==1.1.0 ; python_version < '3.11' # (jammy)\nrjsmin==1.2.0 ; python_version >= '3.11'\nrl-renderPM==4.0.3 ; sys_platform == 'win32' and python_version >= '3.12' # Needed by reportlab 4.1.0 but included in deb package\nurllib3==1.26.5 ; python_version < '3.12' # indirect / min version = 1.25.8 (Focal with security backports)\nurllib3==2.0.7 ; python_version >= '3.12' # (Noble) Compatibility with cryptography\nvobject==0.9.6.1\nWerkzeug==2.0.2 ; python_version <= '3.10' \nWerkzeug==2.2.2 ; python_version > '3.10' and python_version < '3.12'\nWerkzeug==3.0.1 ; python_version >= '3.12' # (Noble) Avoid deprecation warnings\nxlrd==1.2.0 ; python_version < '3.12' # (jammy)\nxlrd==2.0.1 ; python_version >= '3.12'\nXlsxWriter==3.0.2 ; python_version < '3.12' # (jammy)\nXlsxWriter==3.1.9 ; python_version >= '3.12'\nxlwt==1.3.0\nzeep==4.1.0 ; python_version < '3.11' # (jammy)\nzeep==4.2.1 ; python_version >= '3.11'\n ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Python Dependencies for Odoo Project DESCRIPTION: This snippet lists the required Python packages and their specific versions for the Odoo project, formatted typically for a requirements file used by pip. It includes dependencies for network interface information (netifaces), Public-Key Cryptography Standards #11 (PyKCS11), a Ghostscript wrapper, simple encryption/decryption (cryptocode), SMB/CIFS client functionality (pysmb), a WebSocket client implementation (websocket-client), and job scheduling (schedule). A comment notes the availability of a pre-compiled wheel package for PyKCS11 specifically for Python 3.12. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/setup/win32/requirements-local-proxy.txt#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` netifaces==0.11.0 PyKCS11==1.5.16 # wheel package available for python 3.12 ghostscript==0.7 cryptocode==0.1 pysmb==1.2.9.1 websocket-client==1.6.3 schedule==1.2.1 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Odoo Version Support Matrix in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Markdown table showing which Odoo versions are currently supported for security updates. Versions 16.0 through 18.0 are supported, while versions 15.0 and below are unsupported. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/SECURITY.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Version | Supported | | ------- | ------------------ | | 18.0 | :white_check_mark: | | 17.0 | :white_check_mark: | | 16.0 | :white_check_mark: | | <=15.0 | :x: | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: CCLA Signature Form Template DESCRIPTION: A template form for corporations to complete when signing the Odoo Corporate Contributor License Agreement. It includes fields for corporation information, point of contact details, and signature. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/doc/cla/ccla-1.0.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` Corporation name: __________________________________________ Corporation address: _______________________________________ _______________________________________ Country: ___________________________________________________ Point of contact: __________________________________________ Title: _____________________________________________________ Email: _____________________________________________________ Telephone: _________________________________________________ Signature: _________________________________________________ Date: ______________________________________________________ ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Contributor Information Form in Markdown DESCRIPTION: A markdown form template for contributors to fill out their personal information and sign the agreement. It includes fields for full name, email, telephone, mailing address, country, signature, and date. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/doc/cla/icla-1.0.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ``` Full Name: _________________________________________________ Email: _____________________________________________________ Telephone: _________________________________________________ Mailing Address: ___________________________________________ ___________________________________________ Country: ___________________________________________________ Signature: _________________________________________________ Date: ______________________________________________________ ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Documenting PayPal Module History in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet outlines the version history of the PayPal module in Odoo, detailing changes made in versions 18.0, 17.0, 16.2, 16.1, and 15.2. It includes information about API changes, feature removals, and error handling updates. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/payment_paypal/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` - `18.0` - The NVP/SOAP API that allowed for redirect payments is replaced by a combination of the JavaScript SDK and the Standard Checkout API. odoo/odoo#167402 - `17.0` - The support for customer fees is removed as it is no longer supported by the `payment` module. odoo/odoo#132104 - `16.2` - The "Merchant Account ID" and "Use IPN" fields are removed. odoo/odoo#104974 - `16.1` - Customer fees are converted into the currency of the payment transaction. odoo/odoo#100156 - `15.2` - An HTTP 404 "Forbidden" error is raised instead of a Validation error when the authenticity of the webhook notification cannot be verified. odoo/odoo#81607 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Corporate CLA Signature File (Markdown) DESCRIPTION: Template for the Markdown file (`.md`) required for a company to sign the Odoo Corporate Contributor License Agreement (CCLA) v1.0. Replace placeholders with company and signatory details (country, date, company name, name, Git email, GitHub login), list authorized contributors, and submit via a pull request to `doc/cla/corporate/`. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/doc/cla/sign-cla.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` , agrees to the terms of the Odoo Corporate Contributor License Agreement v1.0. I declare that I am authorized and able to make this agreement and sign this declaration. Signed, https://github.com/ List of contributors: https://github.com/ ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Individual CLA Signature File (Markdown) DESCRIPTION: Template for the Markdown file (`.md`) required for an individual contributor to sign the Odoo Individual Contributor License Agreement (ICLA) v1.0. Replace placeholders with personal details (country, date, name, Git email, GitHub login) and submit via a pull request to `doc/cla/individual/`. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/doc/cla/sign-cla.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` , I hereby agree to the terms of the Odoo Individual Contributor License Agreement v1.0. I declare that I am authorized and able to make this agreement and sign this declaration. Signed, https://github.com/ ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Geocoder Service Integration in Odoo DESCRIPTION: The documentation describes how to implement geocoding provider integration in Odoo. It requires implementing a method `_call_` in the `base.geocoder` object which accepts an address string and returns latitude/longitude coordinates. Additionally, an optional method `_geo_query_address_` can be defined to encode address queries. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/base_geolocalize/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` A method `_call_` should be implemented in object `base.geocoder` that accepts an address string as parameter and return (latitude, longitude) tuple for this to work. If no default provider is set, the first one will be used by default. An optional method `_geo_query_address_` which takes address fields as parameters can be defined to encode the query string for the provider. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Removing Base Stage Inheritance in Odoo CRM and Claims DESCRIPTION: Removes inheritance from the 'base_stage' class for the 'crm' and 'crm_claim' modules. Missing methods are added directly to these modules. Also removes inheritance in 'crm_helpdesk' due to its use of states instead of stages. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/crm/doc/changelog.rst#2025-04-23_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` "crm", "crm_claim": removed inheritance from "base_stage" class. Missing methods have been added into "crm" and "crm_claim". Also removed inheritance in "crm_helpdesk" because it uses states, not stages. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: HTML Structure for Website Building Block DESCRIPTION: Example HTML structure for a website building block with thumbnail and body sections. The thumbnail is shown in the edit bar while the body is the actual content inserted into the page. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/website/doc/website.snippet.rst#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```
...Block Name...
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: VISA Test Card Configuration for AsiaPay Integration Testing DESCRIPTION: A set of test VISA card details to use when testing the AsiaPay payment integration. Includes card number, expiry date, CVC code, cardholder name, and 3DS authentication password. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/payment_asiapay/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` **Card Number**: `4335900000140045` **Expiry Date**: `07/2030` **CVC Code**: `123` **Name**: `testing card` **3DS Password**: `password` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying PayPal API and SDK Information in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet provides information about the PayPal API and SDK used in the Odoo integration. It specifies the API as PayPal Standard Checkout and the SDK as JavaScript SDK, along with their respective documentation links. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/payment_paypal/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` API: [PayPal Standard Checkout](https://developer.paypal.com/studio/checkout/standard) SDK: [JavaScript SDK](https://developer.paypal.com/sdk/js/reference/) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Personal Profile Information in Text Format DESCRIPTION: A text-based profile format showing personal details including name, multi-line address, qualification, email and mobile number. Uses aligned key-value pairs with colon separators. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/hr_recruitment/data/hr_recruitment_demo_jose_cv.txt#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` Name : Jose Address : 93, Press Avenue : Le Bourget du Lac, 73377, : France Qualification : MCA Email : Jose@gmail.com Mobile : 9968513587 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Changelog Table of Contents in reStructuredText DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the table of contents specifically for the changelog section using reStructuredText format. It references the changelog.rst file which likely contains version history and updates for the CRM module. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/crm/doc/index.rst#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: rst CODE: ``` .. toctree:: :maxdepth: 1 changelog.rst ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: QWeb Snippet Template Declaration DESCRIPTION: Example of how to declare a snippet template with QWeb and reference it in the snippet structure or a demo page. Demonstrates both t-snippet and data-oe-call approaches. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/website/doc/website.snippet.rst#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Table of Contents for CRM Documentation in reStructuredText DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the table of contents structure for CRM documentation using reStructuredText format. It creates a hierarchical documentation structure with main topics and changelog sections, each pointing to specific documentation files. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/crm/doc/index.rst#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: rst CODE: ``` .. toctree:: :maxdepth: 1 stage_status.rst ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Task Stage Change Subtype Condition in Python DESCRIPTION: Condition used to trigger the mt_task_stage subtype notification when a task's stage has changed. This is triggered when a task's stage_id exists and the stage's sequence is not 1. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/project/doc/stage_status.rst#2025-04-23_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: python CODE: ``` obj.stage_id and obj.stage_id.sequence != 1 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating CRM Lead Model in Odoo DESCRIPTION: Removes the 'state' field from the crm.lead model and adds a 'date_last_stage_update' field to track the last stage_id modification. Reports are updated accordingly. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/crm/doc/changelog.rst#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` "crm.lead": removed "state" field. Added "date_last_stage_update" field holding last stage_id modification. Updated reports. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Task Blocked Subtype Condition in Python DESCRIPTION: Condition used to trigger the mt_task_blocked subtype notification when a task's kanban state is set to blocked. This is triggered when a task's kanban_state equals 'blocked'. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/project/doc/stage_status.rst#2025-04-23_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: python CODE: ``` obj.kanban_state == 'blocked' ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Task Assigned Subtype Condition in Python DESCRIPTION: Condition used to trigger the mt_task_assigned subtype notification when a task has been assigned to a user. This is triggered when a task's user_id exists and has a valid id. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/project/doc/stage_status.rst#2025-04-23_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: python CODE: ``` obj.user_id and obj.user_id.id ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Testing VISA Card Details for Amazon Payment Services DESCRIPTION: Test credit card information for testing Amazon Payment Services integration. Includes the test VISA card number, expiry date requirements, and CVC code requirements. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/payment_aps/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` **Card Number**: `4111111111111111` **Expiry Date**: any date in the future **CVC Code**: any ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Nuvei Test Card Configuration - VISA DESCRIPTION: Test card details for processing VISA transactions up to $99 on the Nuvei payment gateway. Includes card number, expiry date and security code specifications. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/payment_nuvei/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` Card Number: 4761344136141390\nExpiry Date: Any date in the future\nSecurity Code: 123 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Task New Subtype Condition in Python DESCRIPTION: Condition used to trigger the mt_task_new subtype notification for new tasks. This is triggered when a task's stage_id exists and the stage's sequence is 1. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/project/doc/stage_status.rst#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: python CODE: ``` obj.stage_id and obj.stage_id.sequence == 1 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Testing VISA Card Details for Mercado Pago Integration DESCRIPTION: This code snippet provides test card details for Mercado Pago integration. It includes a VISA card number, expiry date, and security code for testing purposes. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/payment_mercado_pago/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ### VISA **Card Number**: `4075595715555555` **Expiry Date**: `11/25` **Security Code**: `123` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: VISA Test Card Details for Razorpay Integration DESCRIPTION: Test card details for VISA to be used during development and testing of Razorpay payment integration. Includes card number, expiry date, card secret, and OTP requirements. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/payment_razorpay/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` **Card Number**: `4111111111111111` **Expiry Date**: any future date **Card Secret**: any **OTP**: `1111` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Checking if a Task is New in Python DESCRIPTION: Code snippet showing the condition used to determine if a project task is considered 'new'. A task is considered new when its stage_id exists and the stage's sequence is 1. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/project/doc/stage_status.rst#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: python CODE: ``` stage_id and stage_id.sequence = 1 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Table of Contents for Mass Mailing Documentation in reStructuredText DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines a table of contents (toctree) for the Mass Mailing module documentation. It specifies a maximum depth of 1 and includes a link to the changelog.rst file. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/mass_mailing/doc/index.rst#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: restructuredtext CODE: ``` .. toctree:: :maxdepth: 1 changelog.rst ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Table of Contents for Project Module Documentation in reStructuredText DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the table of contents for the project module documentation using reStructuredText directives. It includes links to the stage status documentation and the changelog. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/project/doc/index.rst#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: reStructuredText CODE: ``` .. toctree:: :maxdepth: 1 stage_status.rst .. toctree:: :maxdepth: 1 changelog.rst ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Testing MasterCard Details for Flutterwave DESCRIPTION: Test credit card details for Flutterwave payment integration testing, including card number, expiry date, CVC code and OTP. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/payment_flutterwave/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` **Card Number**: `5531886652142950` **Expiry Date**: `09/32` **CVC Code**: `564` **OPT**: `12345` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Stripe Card Testing Information in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Testing instructions for Stripe payments, including test card number, expiry date, and CVC code requirements for development and testing environments. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/payment_stripe/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` **Card Number**: `4111111111111111` **Expiry Date**: any future date **CVC Code**: any ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Test VISA Card for Worldline Integration DESCRIPTION: Test card number for VISA payment processing with Worldline. Used for testing the payment integration without requiring a real credit card. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/payment_worldline/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` **Card Number**: `4330264936344675` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Test VISA Card with 3D Secure 2 for Worldline Integration DESCRIPTION: Test card number for VISA with 3D Secure 2 authentication support. Used for testing the 3D Secure authentication flow in the Worldline payment integration. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/payment_worldline/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` **Card Number**: `4874970686672022` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: UPI Test ID Details for Razorpay Integration DESCRIPTION: Test UPI IDs for success and failure scenarios to be used during development and testing of Razorpay UPI payment integration. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/payment_razorpay/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` **UPI ID**: `success@razorpay` or `failure@razorpay` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Testing eCheck Details for Authorize.net DESCRIPTION: Test bank account details for eCheck payments to be used in development and testing environments. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/payment_authorize/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` Bank Name: whatever Name On Account: whatever Account Number: 123456 ABA Routing Number: 121122676 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Testing Credit Card Numbers for Authorize.net DESCRIPTION: Test card numbers for VISA and MasterCard to be used in development and testing environments. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/payment_authorize/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` VISA: 4111111111111111 MasterCard: 5424000000000015 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Lost Stage Convention in Odoo CRM DESCRIPTION: Python expressions defining the conditions for lost opportunities with 0% probability. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/crm/doc/stage_status.rst#2025-04-23_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: python CODE: ``` stage_id and stage_id.probability = 0 and stage_id.on_change = True and stage_id.sequence != 1 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Won Stage Convention in Odoo CRM DESCRIPTION: Python expressions defining the conditions for won opportunities with 100% probability. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/crm/doc/stage_status.rst#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: python CODE: ``` stage_id and stage_id.probability = 100 and stage_id.on_change = True ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining New Stage Convention in Odoo CRM DESCRIPTION: Python expressions defining the conditions for identifying new leads based on stage sequence. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/crm/doc/stage_status.rst#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: python CODE: ``` stage_id and stage_id.sequence = 1 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Lead Creation Subtype Condition in Odoo CRM DESCRIPTION: Python condition for triggering the new lead creation notification subtype. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/crm/doc/stage_status.rst#2025-04-23_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: python CODE: ``` obj.probability == 0 and obj.stage_id and obj.stage_id.sequence == 1 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Lost Lead Subtype Condition in Odoo CRM DESCRIPTION: Python condition for triggering the lost lead notification subtype. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/crm/doc/stage_status.rst#2025-04-23_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: python CODE: ``` obj.probability == 0 and obj.stage_id and obj.stage_id.sequence != 1 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adyen 3D Secure 2 Test Card Configuration DESCRIPTION: Test card details for 3D Secure 2 authentication testing on Adyen. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/payment_adyen/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` Card Number: 5454545454545454 Expiry Date: 03/30 CVC Code: 737 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Won Lead Subtype Condition in Odoo CRM DESCRIPTION: Python condition for triggering the won lead notification subtype. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/crm/doc/stage_status.rst#2025-04-23_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: python CODE: ``` obj.probability == 100 and obj.stage_id and obj.stage_id.on_change ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating CRM Case Stage Model in Odoo DESCRIPTION: Removes the 'state' field from the crm.case.stage model. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/crm/doc/changelog.rst#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` "crm.case.stage": removed "state" field. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adyen VISA Test Card Configuration DESCRIPTION: Test card details for VISA payment method testing on Adyen. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/payment_adyen/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` Card Number: 4111111145551142 Expiry Date: 03/30 CVC Code: 737 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Stage Change Subtype Condition in Odoo CRM DESCRIPTION: Python condition for triggering the stage change notification subtype. SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/crm/doc/stage_status.rst#2025-04-23_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: python CODE: ``` (obj.stage_id and obj.stage_id.sequence != 1) and obj.probability < 100 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Mollie Test Card Details DESCRIPTION: Test credit card details for Mollie payment gateway testing SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/payment_mollie/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` **Card Number**: `4111111111111111` **Expiry Date**: `123` **CVC Code**: `123` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Mollie API Version Reference DESCRIPTION: Reference to Mollie Payments API version specification SOURCE: https://github.com/odoo/odoo/blob/18.0/addons/payment_mollie/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` API: [Payments API](https://docs.mollie.com/reference/v2/payments-api/create-payment) version `2` ```
